synthesis_routes.chemicals_used: Co(NO3)2·6H2O (98% Aldrich, 1.273 g), 1,4-diazabicyclo[2,2,2]octane (98% Aldrich, 0.337 g), sulfuric acid solution (0.44 cm3 of concentrated sulfuric acid (98% Aldrich) in 9.00 cm3 of deionized water), KOH aqueous solution (4.40 cm3 of a 6 M solution), aluminum isopropoxide (Al[(CH3)2CHO]3, 0.1276 g)
synthesis_routes.equipment: sealed hydrothermal bomb with a Teflon liner (22 cm3 volume and 70% fill factor)
synthesis_routes.yield: sensitive to reaction composition, temperature, and cooling rate

synthesis_routes.chemicals_used: Co(NO3)2·6H2O (3.0 g), Na2SO4 (1.5 g), DABCO (0.77 g), NaOH solution (0.26 g in 40 mL of distilled water)
synthesis_routes.yield: blue microcrystals, identical to route 1 by powder X-ray diffraction

synthesis_routes.chemicals_used: Co(NO3)2·6H2O, H2SO4, ethylenediamine, KOH, and water with molar ratio of 1:2:0.6:5.4:100, respectively
